_header: Alas it is a rueful monge
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, Ascension of
_description: English verse in a Latin sermon on the Ascension — one couplet

CULIi38.Transcription: Alas it is a reuful mangeof myth strong & wyl wrong
CULIi38.Note: In Latin sermon de ascensione domini.
